recipesJson.name: Blueberry Lemon Dump Cake
recipesJson.author: Blackblade
recipesJson.description: A delicious blend of lemon and blueberry. Savory and sweet without the excessive use of sweeteners. Give this a week steep for best results.

reviews.text: This is a great recipe and exactly what I needed. I was a little sceptical when I saw the amount of ingredients, but I glad I took the chance. If I can give on criticism, take out the fruity flakes. It distracts from the profile. I did mix it up and it tasted miles better without it.
